languages.text: "Да думаю, была не была! Хвать его за плечи — и в кашу. Топила, пока сознание не потерял. Тогдашний Мастер дисциплины наградил меня за смекалку и поимку вредителя, но испорченную кашу из жалования вычел".

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."
languages.original_text: "Да думаю, была не была! Хвать его за плечи — и в кашу. Топила, пока сознание не потерял. Тогдашний Мастер дисциплины наградил меня за смекалку и поимку вредителя, но испорченную кашу из жалования вычел".

traits.locale_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and sank him into the porridge. I kept drowning the brute until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms praised my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the pest, but deducted the cost of the ruined porridge from my wages."

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and sank him into the porridge. I kept drowning the brute until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms praised my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the pest, but deducted the cost of the ruined porridge from my wages."

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the worm, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the worm, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

"And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

languages.text: "Und das war's! Ich habe ihn bei den Schultern gepackt und in den Haferbrei gezogen. Ich habe den Rohling untergetaucht, bis er das Bewusstsein verlor. Der damalige Waffenmeister lobte meinen Einfallsreichtum und zeichnete mich für die Verhaftung des Giftmischers aus, zog mit aber auch die Kosten für den Haferbrei vom Sold ab."
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

traits.locale_text: "Und das war's! Ich habe ihn bei den Schultern gepackt und in den Haferbrei gezogen. Ich habe den Rohling untergetaucht, bis er das Bewusstsein verlor. Der damalige Waffenmeister lobte meinen Einfallsreichtum und zeichnete mich für die Verhaftung des Giftmischers aus, zog mit aber auch die Kosten für den Haferbrei vom Sold ab."

languages.text: «¡Era mi oportunidad! Le agarré por los hombros y le hundí la cabeza en las gachas hasta que perdió el conocimiento. El maestro de armas de aquel entonces alabó mi ingenio y recomendó que me ascendieran por capturar al prisionero... pero también me restó de la paga el precio de las gachas».
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

traits.locale_text: «¡Era mi oportunidad! Le agarré por los hombros y le hundí la cabeza en las gachas hasta que perdió el conocimiento. El maestro de armas de aquel entonces alabó mi ingenio y recomendó que me ascendieran por capturar al prisionero... pero también me restó de la paga el precio de las gachas».

languages.text: 「その時です！私は男の肩をつかみ、粥の中に沈めました。気絶するまで押さえつけた。男が意識を手放すまで、押さえ込みましたよ。当時のマスター・アット・アームは私の知略を称えて毒殺犯の確保を褒めてくれましたが、お粥代は給料から引かれてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

traits.locale_text: 「その時です！私は男の肩をつかみ、粥の中に沈めました。気絶するまで押さえつけた。男が意識を手放すまで、押さえ込みましたよ。当時のマスター・アット・アームは私の知略を称えて毒殺犯の確保を褒めてくれましたが、お粥代は給料から引かれてしまいました」

languages.text: “就是他了！我抓住他的肩膀，把他按到了粥里。我死死地按住那个混蛋，把他憋得晕了过去。当时的戒律大师称赞了我的聪明才智，表扬我抓住了投毒者，但他也从我的工资里把粥钱扣掉了。”
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

traits.locale_text: “就是他了！我抓住他的肩膀，把他按到了粥里。我死死地按住那个混蛋，把他憋得晕了过去。当时的戒律大师称赞了我的聪明才智，表扬我抓住了投毒者，但他也从我的工资里把粥钱扣掉了。”

languages.text: « Il était fait ! Je l'ai attrapé par les épaules et je l'ai tiré dans le gruau. Puis je l'ai maintenu sous la surface jusqu'à ce qu'il perde connaissance. À l'époque, le capitaine d'armes a loué mon ingéniosité et m'a récompensée pour avoir appréhendé l'empoisonneur, mais il a également retenu le coût du gruau sur ma solde. »
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."

traits.locale_text: « Il était fait ! Je l'ai attrapé par les épaules et je l'ai tiré dans le gruau. Puis je l'ai maintenu sous la surface jusqu'à ce qu'il perde connaissance. À l'époque, le capitaine d'armes a loué mon ingéniosité et m'a récompensée pour avoir appréhendé l'empoisonneur, mais il a également retenu le coût du gruau sur ma solde. »

languages.text: "İşte aradığım fırsat buydu! Adamı omuzlarından kapıp lapaya batırdım. Çam yarmasını kendinden geçene kadar öyle tuttum. O zamanki Silahtar, pratik zekâma övgüler yağdırarak zehirciyi yakalama işini bana bıraktı. Ancak heba olan lapanın tutarını da maaşımdan düştü."
languages.original_text: "And that was it! I grabbed him by the shoulders and dunked him into the porridge. I held the brute down until he passed out. The Master-at-Arms back then, he lauded my ingenuity and commended me for apprehending the poisoner, but he also took the cost of the porridge out of my wages."
